title: Minister paints wrong picture – Dharmadasa
content: Multi-million-dollar cricket TV deal hots up as Aluthgamage orders to call for tenders Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) President Upali Dharmadasa rejected a media release issued by the Sports Ministry yesterday alleging that Dharmadasa had requested the Sports Minister Mahindananda Aluthgamage to renew the SLC TV contract with Ten Sports for another seven years without calling…
